title: Meeting with the Federation of Pedicab Drivers of Calbayog
description:
Meeting with the Federation of Pedicab Drivers of Calbayog

The members of the federation expressed their willingness to join the city in commemorating its Charter Day in October 16, 2022. They will celebrate Pedicab Drivers Day in October 14, 2022 with some series of activities.

Also present during the meeting was Hon. Rosendo A. Morales, SP Chairman of the Committee on Transportation and Communications.

title: The 3-Year (2022-2025) Executive-Legislative Agenda (ELA) Conference.
description:
September 21, 2022

The 3-Year (2022-2025) Executive-Legislative Agenda (ELA) Conference.

The ELA was derived from the series of workshops previously conducted by the Technical Working Group Sectoral Teams with their PPAs, Goals and Objectives.

Honorable City Mayor Raymund Uy presented the 3-year priority programs, projects and activities of each sector. "Results" shall be taken as an added account to determine the impact of these programs, projects and activities to the people.

title: Consultative Meeting with Samar Governor Sharee Ann Tan and Vice-governor Arnold Tan
description:
September 17, 2022

Consultative Meeting with Samar Governor Sharee Ann Tan and Vice-governor Arnold Tan with some Calbayog lgu officials and employees for 2023 programs in collaboration with the provincial government particularly on priority programs for health, agriculture and tourism.

The governor visited the Parksyadahan site after the successful meeting.

title: Tagaytay Tourism with HON. RAYMOND 'MON MON' C. UY, City Mayor
description:
It is our honor to have you in our city HON. RAYMOND 'MON MON' C. UY, City Mayor (City Mayor's Office, Calbayog City) and City Officials from the City of Calbayog, Province of Samar.

We value your presence more than anything, and your satisfaction is what we aim for! Welcome to you and thank you for visiting us!
Hon. Abraham "Bambol" Tolentino
City Government of Tagaytay
#TagaytayTourism
#LAKBAYARAL2022

title: Grand Opening of the Professional Regulation Commission (PRC) Offsite Office in Calbayog City
description:
September 9, 2022

Grand Opening of the Professional Regulation Commission (PRC) Offsite Office in Calbayog City.

Planned almost a year ago, the Calbayog Offsite Office of PRC successfully opened today. It is located at the 3rd flr. of the Government Center Bldg. in Brgy. Bagacay, Calbayog City and is the first offsite office in the Visayas. The office will serve clients not only from Calbayog but from the whole Samar island.

Commissioner Erwin M. Enad stressed the need for PRC to be visible to the LGUs as the key for a national agency to be effective is to strengthen relationship with LGUs. City Mayor Raymund C. Uy, responded by pledging full support to their needs.

Also present during the ceremony are Mr. Armond M. Englis, PRC Regional Director, Mr. Dioscoro A. Lumagbas, PRC Chief Administrative Officer, and other government officials from lgu Calbayog, PNP, and DepEd.

title: Updates on the Status of the Illegal Settler Families (ISF) at the property of the National Housing Authority in Brgy. Sinidman Occidental, Oquendo District, Calbayog City.
description:
August 31, 2022

Updates on the Status of the Illegal Settler Families (ISF) at the property of the National Housing Authority in Brgy. Sinidman Occidental, Oquendo District, Calbayog City.

Tagging and Census was done on August 10, 2022 and out of the thirty-two (32) identified ISF, thirty-one (31) qualified as beneficiaries of the housing project.

This was given consideration since the local (barangay) officials requested that the 31 ISF be in the priority list of beneficiaries although they will not anymore be recipients of the NHA cash assistance given to indigent families.

title: 1st Regular Session of the Sangguniang Panlungsod of the City of Calbayog
description:
1st Regular Session of the Sangguniang Panlungsod of the City of Calbayog held at the Legislative Hall on July 04, 2022 at 10:05 o'clock in the morning with the Hon. Rex M. Daguman, City Vice Mayor, Presiding Officer and attended by thirteen (13) City Councilors, namely: Hon. Atty. Eduardo P. Tibo, Hon. Abbie Joy I. Yulo, Hon. Florencio U. Enriquez, Hon. Rosendo A. Morales, Hon. Marc Celino B. Tan, Hon. Rey James R. Uy, Hon. Jessie C. Gianan, Hon. Dolores G. Delos Santos, Hon. Rosela C. Sumagang, Hon. Rhena G. Tafalla, Hon. Minda D. Pasacas, Hon. Jocelyn A. Tan & Hon. Joebert Vincent Anthony M. Genotiva. Approved legislation follows:

1. Resolution No. 2022-01-001- A RESOLUTION ADOPTING THE EXISTING RULES OF PROCEDURES OF THE SANGGUNIANG PANLUNGSOD OF CALBAYOG CITY WITH AMENDMENTS PARTICULARLY ON SECTION 1 ( DRESS CODE) OF RULE VI (ATTIRE) AND SECTION 1 ( REGULAR SESSION) OF RULE IV ( SESSIONS AND QUORUM).

title: The Exit Conference for Barangays CY 2019-2021
description:
The Exit Conference for Barangays CY 2019-2021 was held last September 29, 2022 at Baypark Hotel.

The whole day event was spearheaded by the City Auditor’s Office of Calbayog City lead by the City Auditor Mr. Leopoldo A. Marcial Jr. together with his team of auditors.

The main purpose of this affair is to communicate with barangay officials regarding various financial concerns of their respective barangays in order to correct and/or improve their accounting process and financial reporting.

It was also attended by representatives from the Office of the City Accountant lead by our new City Accountant Mr. Vauhn Wan P. Uy, CPA

The said event was graced by the Hon. Mayor Raymund C. Uy who delivered the closing remarks.

title: Hands-only Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) Mass Demonstration
description: The Office of the City Accountant’s employees attended the ”Hands-only Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) Mass Demonstration” training conducted by CDRRMO, CHO and CHRMO as part of the 122nd Philippine Civil Service Anniversary held at Calbayog City Sports Center today September 28, 2022.

title: 1st Regular Meeting of City Development Council of Calbayog City under the chairmanship of Mayor Raymund C. Uy and Vice Chairman Rex M. Daguman conducted last 8/12/2022.
description:
1st Regular Meeting of City Development Council of Calbayog City under the chairmanship of Mayor Raymund C. Uy and Vice Chairman Rex M. Daguman conducted last 8/12/2022.

The Council was reorganized based on EO No. 009 S. of 2022. CPDO served as Secretariat of the Council. It was attended by Congressman Stephen James T. Tan, Barangay Captains, SP Members, Department Heads, Civil Societies Org., Local/National Agencies, and Guests. A total of 283 participated the event.

title: Three-day activity in relation to City Cooperative Month Celebration. Posted on October 5, 2022
description:
The City Veterinary Office thru Dr. Editha A. Ancheta, City Veterinarian, is very much thankful to Ma'am Clarita B. Oliver, OIC - City Cooperative Officer of the City Coop Office, for the opportunity extended to Calbayog Rabbit Raisers & Entrepreneurs Association (CRREA) to participate/join the three-day activity in relation to City Cooperative Month Celebration.

This is one way of promoting Rabbit Farming as part of the livelihood program & as an alternative livelihood opportunity to our livestock farmers/raisers. This program is part of the citywide implementation of food security & nutrition program of Hon. City Mayor Raymund C. Uy.

title: The  owner of R and R Farm Learning Site, Sir Reynaldo C. Aniban received 3 Stingless Bee Colonies and Rabbits
description:
The owner of R and R Farm Learning Site, Sir Reynaldo C. Aniban received 3 Stingless Bee Colonies and Rabbits from Dr. Editha A. Ancheta, City Veterinarian and Dr. Jason F. Nunez , Farm Supervisor.

This is part of the CVO Adopt a Bee Colony Program and Rabbit Dispersal from the Livestock Multiplier Center, a special project of LGU- CVO. Mr. Aniban is the President of Geragaan Lowland - Upland Association and Vice Pres. of Calbayog Integrated Livestock Raisers Association.

title: Second Day of the activities in the observance of World Rabies Day conducted by the City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog.
description: Second Day of the activities in the observance of World Rabies Day conducted by the City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog.

title: Day 1 of the activities in the observance of World Rabies Day
description:
Day 1 of the activities in the observance of World Rabies Day were successfully conducted with the full force from the City Veterinary Office Staff despite the unfavorable weather condition.

Thank you so much for the cooperation of the Pet Owners, to the UNAHCO - Univet Nutrition & Animal Healthcare Company, to the PVO thru Dr. Narlita B. Rafon & to our Hon. City Mayor Raymund C. Uy for his valuable support to the Rabies Prevention and Control Program.

title: The City Veterinary Office of LGU-Calbayog together with the City Health Office, will be celebrating World Rabies Day
description:
The City Veterinary Office of LGU-Calbayog together with the City Health Office, will be celebrating World Rabies Day with the theme: "Rabies: One Health, Zero Deaths" this coming September 28 & 29, 2022 (Wednesday & Thursday).

Free Services offered:

1. Neutering of Male Cats and Dog
2. Rabies Vaccination
3. Deworming
4. Vitamin Supplementation
5. Mange Treatment
6. Free Consultation
7. Seminar on Dog Bite Management from CHO

Venue: Brgy. Bagacay Multipurpose Hall

The City Vet. Office thru Dr. Editha A. Ancheta, City Veterinarian is very much grateful for the valuable support of Hon. City Mayor Raymund C. Uy to the Rabies Prevention and Control Program.

title: With strong partnership between the NWSSU and  City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog
description:
With strong partnership between the NWSSU and City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog, another seminar in line with NWSSU Extension Project was conducted in Brgy. Oquendo on Sept. 23, 2022.

Rationale of the Activity was given by Ms. Sance J. Secondez , Msc Project Leader , Inspirational Message was delivered by Dr. Editha A. Ancheta, City Veterinarian and Opening Remarks by Brgy. Chairman Hon. Jaime Hernandez. Dr. Jason F. Nunez of City Vet. Office was the speaker who discussed on Profitable Poultry Production, Management & Disease Prevention. Facilitators during the seminar were Dr. Vercelle Docdoc, Mr. Papiniano Macayan, Jr. from NWSSU and Doc Leonitz Yabao from CVO. It was participated in by beneficiaries of the Poultry Project and some interested farmers from Brgy. Oquendo.

title: 3rd Quarter Meeting for Deputized Meat Inspection Officers
description:
3rd Quarter Meeting for Deputized Meat Inspection Officers conducted on September 23, 2022 at the Island View Beach, Brgy. Malajog, Calbayog City.

Action Officer of NMIS RTOC VIII, Dr. Eduardo Glendon A. Alvarez and his team made a courtesy call to Calbayog City Veterinarian, Dr. Editha A. Ancheta before leading the 3rd Quarter Meeting for Deputized Meat Inspection Officers.

This meeting is to provide updates on regulatory issuances and other issues and concerns regarding the implementation of meat inspection system in the meat establishments. It was attended by CVO Meat Inspection Div. Chief, Dr. Ma. Ruth B. Enriquez and other Deputized Meat Inspection Officers within the Region.

Calbayog City, thru the City Veterinary Office, served as host for this meeting and was assisted by the staff from Meat Inspection Division of CVO.

title: The Northwest Samar State University College of Agriculture & Technology, in collaboration with the City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog, conducted a training on September 16, 2022
description:
The Northwest Samar State University College of Agriculture & Technology, in collaboration with the City Veterinary Office of LGU Calbayog, conducted a training on September 16, 2022 in Brgy. Limarayon in line with NWSSU Extension Project on Raising Ranged Chicken Complemented under Coconut Farming System Phase II.

Dr. Jason F. Nuñez from the City Vet. Office was the speaker & he tackled topics on Profitable Poultry Production, Management & Disease Prevention. Present during the training to deliver messages were Dr. Editha A. Ancheta, Sance J. Secondez, MSC, Project Leader/Extension Coordinator, & Dr. Vercelle Docdoc from NWSSU
The said training was attended by Brgy. Chairman – Hon. Joel Manuales & recipients of the NWSSU Extension Project in Brgy. Limarayon with the assistance of Doc Leonitz Yabao.

title: ERICA Agriprocessing Plant Audit
description:
ERICA AgriProcessing Plant located in Brgy. Cagsalaosao, Calbayog City is continuously monitored by the City Veterinary Office, Meat Inspection Division.

On September 15, 2022, Lead Auditor, Dr. Daisy Morales, Assistant Auditor, Dr. Sheila Cepedoza from NMIS Central Office and Mr. Juluis, Meat Inspector III, from NMIS Region 8, along with Deputized Meat Control Officer for ERICA, Dr. Ma. Ruth B. Enriquez of the City Veterinary Office, conducted an Audit to ensure it conforms to the standard of an AA processing facility in connection with its requirements in the renewal of its accreditation.

title: Libre nga ginhahatag nga serbisyo san City Legal Services Office an paghimo affidavits, special power of attorney (SPA), o iba pa nga mga legal nga kasuratan o dokumento, para sa mga Calbayognon.
description:
Libre nga ginhahatag nga serbisyo san City Legal Services Office an paghimo affidavits, special power of attorney (SPA), o iba pa nga mga legal nga kasuratan o dokumento, para sa mga Calbayognon.

Yana nga semana, padayon an aton pagbulig sa aton mga igkasi. Mao ini an pipira san mga legal nga kasuratan o dokumento nga libre nga ginhahatag san aton opisina:-Affidavit of loss

-Affidavit of two disinterested person
-Sworn statement
-Affidavit of legitimation
-Acknowledgement of paternity/filiation
-Affidavit of cohabitation
-Affidavit of undertaking
-Demand letter for support
-Special Power of Attorney
-Other legal documents

#LibreSerbisyoLegal
#SerbisyoParaSaCalbayognon

title: Padayon an serbisyo para sa aton mga igkasi Calbayognon.
description:
Padayon an serbisyo para sa aton mga igkasi Calbayognon. Sira an pipira nga mga bumisita sa aton opisina sini nga naglabay nga mga adlaw para mag avail san aton libre nga serbisyo legal.

Kun mayda kam mga pakiana ug mga panginahanglan regarding legal matters, andam bumulig an opisina. Pwede kam bumisita sa City Legal Services Office, 2nd floor san City Hall tikang Lunes ngadto Biyernes, 8am to 5pm.

#LibreSerbisyoLegal
#SerbisyoParaSaCalbayognon

title: 73 out of 157 barangays have already submitted their Barangay Disaster Risk Reduction Management Plan (BDRRMP).
description:
73 out of 157 barangays have already submitted their Barangay Disaster Risk Reduction Management Plan (BDRRMP).

The BDRRMP seeks ways to help communities effectively use local resources and capacities to better prepare for disasters, and to adopt measures to reduce their vulnerability. It aims to determine people’s vulnerability to those risks, and their capacity to cope and recover from a disaster. As the political unit in the grassroots level, the Barangay Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Committee (BDRRMC) was mandated to implement RA 10121.

title: August 17, 2022 - The Calbayog City Disaster Risk Reduction Management Office (CCDRRMO) meeting
description:
August 17, 2022 - The Calbayog City Disaster Risk Reduction Management Office (CCDRRMO), with its mandate to ensure the safety of Calbayognons, continues to inform its constituents their part in quest for a strengthened resiliency.

Private schools representatives and other school DRRM officers sat with Dr. Sandro C. Daguman, CDDRM Officer, to talk about their preparedness as classes start.
Other agenda were Emergency Plan, Evacuation Plan, Spot Map and inclusion of DRRM in the curriculum.
Social Responsibility and Public Service Cintinuity Plan were also tackled as Standards for an evacuation center was discussed by Ms. Shaula Mar M. Aler, Evacuation Center Management Officer.

Present during the meetin were representatives were representatives from NWSSU, STI, CKC, SPNHS,CCFA,ADSAC,CAMS and other CDRRMO staff.
